section.p: This class records arrival and departure times relevant to the surgery, such as holding area arrival, operating room arrival, operating room departure, etc.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] category with data type Code
Catgorizes the patient movement relevant to the surgery, such as holding area arrival, operating room arrival, operating room departure, etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] time with data type Point In Time
Contains the dates and times that the patient was transported in and out of the OR.

Contains exactly one [1..1] vehicle, where its type is Surgery Device
Identifies the type of vehicle used to transport the patient to and from the operating room, recovery room, intensive care Unit etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] category with data type Code
Catgorizes the patient movement relevant to the surgery, such as holding area arrival, operating room arrival, operating room departure, etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] time with data type Point In Time
Contains the dates and times that the patient was transported in and out of the OR.

Contains exactly one [1..1] vehicle, where its type is Surgery Device
Identifies the type of vehicle used to transport the patient to and from the operating room, recovery room, intensive care Unit etc.
